function.name: mcp_aws_documenta_read_documentation
function.description: Fetch and convert an AWS documentation page to markdown format. URL must be from docs.aws.amazon.com domain and end with .html. For long documents, you can make multiple calls with different start_index values to retrieve the entire content in chunks.

url.description: URL of the AWS documentation page to read

max_length.description: Maximum number of characters to return

start_index.description: Starting character index for paginated reading

function.name: mcp_aws_documenta_search_documentation
function.description: Search AWS documentation using the official AWS Documentation Search API. Use specific technical terms rather than general phrases, include service names to narrow results, and use quotes for exact phrase matching.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

function.name: mcp_aws_documenta_recommend
function.description: Get content recommendations for an AWS documentation page. Provides recommendations for related AWS documentation pages based on a given URL. The recommendations include four categories: Highly Rated, New, Similar, and Journey pages.

url.description: URL of the AWS documentation page to get recommendations for
